page.syntax: Output_List as C = word_evaluate(C input_text ,C command_string [,C delimiter])

argument.name: input_text
argument.description: A list of entries separated by the Delimiter.

page.description: Evaluates an expression on each word in the input string
page.discussion: The WORD_EVALUATE() function executes an Xbasic command against each member of a list.
page.example: dim cc as C cc = <<%str% alpha beta gamma %str% ? word_evaluate(cc, "left(value,3)", crlf() ) = alp bet gam
